articles.title: Can you get into University if you are homeschooled? The answer is yes.
articles.subtitle: Biggest scam I’ve ever pulled off
articles.description: I was homeschooled my whole life before going to university. I am going into my 4th year of University as a Math and Computer Science double major.

events.name: Nova Scotia Open Data Competition
events.text: A two day competition hosted by Dalhousie University where participants pitch a solution in 2 minutes surrounding an economic or health-care issue. The solution must include the use of at least one Nova Scotia open data. I had a fun and challenging time!

events.name: CAN CWiC: Canadian Celebration Of Women In Computing
events.text: Can-CWiC or the Canadian Celebration Of Women in Computing conference is what truly inspired and motivated me to pursue my goals. It was the first time where I got to see and meet so many women working in tech. It got me over my expectation that I had to be more like a man to be able to be taken seriously. 10/10 recommeend for women pursuing a career in computing -  this event will get you hyped up!
